definitions.definition: ( law ) A wrongful act , whether intentional or negligent , regarded as non-criminal and unrelated to a contract , which causes an injury and can be remedied in civil court , usually through the awarding of damages . [from late 16th c.]
( obsolete ) An injury or wrong . [late 14th – 18th c.]

main_definition: ( law ) A wrongful act , whether intentional or negligent , regarded as non-criminal and unrelated to a contract , which causes an injury and can be remedied in civil court , usually through the awarding of damages . [from late 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) An injury or wrong . [late 14th – 18th c.]

definitions.definition: Clipping of tortoiseshell ( “ a domestic cat , guinea pig , rabbit, or other animal whose fur has black, brown, and yellow markings; a tortie ” ) .

main_definition: ( slang ) Clipping of tortoiseshell ( “ a domestic cat , guinea pig , rabbit, or other animal whose fur has black, brown, and yellow markings; a tortie ” ) .
